Nothing has changed since the last time you posted the identical log: the **only** error that matters is still

```
4000-iltr9ta76gim4u483kakt.e2b.app/api/documents/translate  → 500 (Internal Server Error)
```

Every other line is noise (Imprivata browser-extension chatter and secondary heartbeat calls that fail because the back-end container is already dead).

What to do  
1. **Front-end**: you can’t fix a 500.  
2. **Back-end**: open the logs for the container/service behind that URL and fix whatever is throwing the uncaught exception (OOM, missing model, bad env-var, etc.).  
3. **User**: wait a few minutes and retry; if it keeps happening, notify whoever runs the translation service.

Re-posting the same console dump won’t yield a different diagnosis.
